trial_type.Description: Indicator of type of action that is expected

Levels.go: A red square is displayed to indicate starting
Levels.stop: A blue square is displayed to indicate stopping

response_time.Description: Time from stimulus presentation until subject presses button

stim_file.Description: Relative path of the stimulus image file

takes_value_def.LongName: Def with a takes value tag
takes_value_def.Description: Relative path of the stimulus image file

unit_class_def.Description: Relative path of the stimulus image file
